pkgmetadata.longdescription: Load Data from 'MyTarget API v2 and v3' // Allows work with 'MyTarget Statistics API v2' https://target.my.com/adv/api- marketing/doc/stat-v2 and 'MyTarget Statistics API v3' https://target.my.com/adv/api- marketing/doc/stat-v2#statisticsv3 load data by ads, campaigns, agency clients and statistic from your ads account.
